closeConnection() - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method closes the connection to the db.
connectToDatabase() - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method connects to the database located at the current JDBC URL.
containsItemNum(User, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is used to check if the inventory of the user already contains the passed in item_num.
containsRecipeIngredient(User, String, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method checks if a user's recipe contains the provided item number.
containsRecipeNum(User, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method is used to check if the recipe list of the user contains the passed in recipe number.
containsRecipeStep(User, String, String) - Method in class application.DatabaseManager
This method checks if a user's recipe contains the provided set number.
